description: The LabelUtil class is used by components to determine the correct text to display for their renderers or sub-parts.

members.description:
A function used by components that support item renderers to determine the correct text an item renderer should display for a data item. If no labelField or labelFunction parameter is specified, the toString() method of the data item is called to return a String representation of the data item.

The labelFunction property takes a reference to a function. The function takes a single argument which is the item in the data provider and returns a String:

\n myLabelFunction(item:Object):String
to an empty string (""), no field will be considered on the data item to represent label. as a single parameter and returns a String.

values: item The data item. Null items return the empty string.
labelField The field in the data item to return. If labelField is set
labelFunction A function that takes the data item
A String representation for the data item
